attributes.action: Give ladies with PCOS more help!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ladies with PCOS grow hair on numerous parts of the body! me myself I have paid over £2000 in laser treatment but could not afford any more treatments.
To be called a MAN for the way you look when its not your fault its NATURE is wrong!!!! Laser hair removal is classed as cosmetic treatment although you can have LOTS of cosmetic treatments on the NHS laser hair removal is NOT one of them.
